critique: The document is a formal order designating Lake Charles, LA as a customs port of entry. It cites the act of Congress that provides the authority for this action. There is no explicit emotional language used. Given the formal and administrative nature of the document, the emotions conveyed are minimal. Therefore, I will assign low scores across all emotions. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.
